Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel THB Sur Mallorca in Ses Salines (Colonia Sant Jordi), you'll be close to Centro de Visitantes del Parque Nacional de Cabrera and Es Trenc Beach. This 4-star hotel is within the region of Cala Santany Beach and Cala Figuera Port.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 198 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax and unwind with massages and body treatments. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as outdoor tennis courts, an outdoor pool, and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in the lobby. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Ses Salines? This hotel has facilities measuring 646 square feet (60 square meters), including a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel THB Sur Mallorca in Ses Salines (Colonia Sant Jordi), you'll be close to Centro de Visitantes del Parque Nacional de Cabrera and Es Trenc Beach. This 4-star hotel is within the region of Cala Santany Beach and Cala Figuera Port.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Centro de Visitantes del Parque Nacional de Cabrera - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Es Trenc Beach - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Cala Santany Beach - 13.8 km / 8.6 mi
Cala Figuera Port - 15.7 km / 9.7 mi
Cala Mondrago Beach - 17.5 km / 10.9 mi
Vall d'Or Golf - 23.6 km / 14.6 mi
Maioris Golf Club - 24.1 km / 15 mi
Aqualand - 27.7 km / 17.2 mi
Port of El Arenal - 28.7 km / 17.8 mi
El Arenal Beach - 28.8 km / 17.9 mi
Cala Domingo Beach - 29.5 km / 18.3 mi
Golf Son Gual - 31.7 km / 19.7 mi
Palma Aquarium - 32.8 km / 20.4 mi
Cala Varques - 33.4 km / 20.8 mi
Golf Park Puntiro - 34.9 km / 21.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel THB Sur Mallorca is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 33.6 km / 20.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
